data.text: “We can also take advantage of the digital space and traditional approaches to educate, raise awareness and community engagement about #WomenInScience to remove the gender gap”  Chief Planetary Health Scientist @SunwayCPH  #AskProfAgnes #IWD2022

"In #LMICs, women are facing an unwanted pregnancy and  pregnancy out of the cultural norms of marriage, an obstacle for even a socio-economic development of girls and women" Prof @agnesbinagwaho #UGHE's Vice Chancellor #AskProfAgnes #WomenInScience

“When the girls get pregnant, we need to encourage them not to stop at that stage but to try to reach their full potential and we need programs for this because this is a huge problem” Prof @MamaDaktari @AKUGlobal @ugent

"We should involve women in the global community giving them equal chances to also climb the ladder taking a leading leadership role in the academia" Prof. @MamaDaktari @AKUGlobal @ugent #AskProfAgnes #WomenInScience #IWD https://t.co/H6cfVpuiM2

“We can put in a lot of money to gender empowering activities, but if we truly do not address the systemic roots, the biases and the stereotypes, the attitudes of men, male scientists like me towards #womeninscience nothing will change” Dr. @RenzoGuinto @SunwayCPH #AskProfAgnes https://t.co/g0g8asoZwt

"To successfully implement the policies to encourage #WomenInScience, it's about accountability, and ensuring that it's not just about us advocating all the time, but having these tangible spaces where we hold people accountable " Prof. @flavia04 @Faculty_HSUP #AskProfAgnes https://t.co/m6exKeneE3

"The gender and diversity audit can be a great tool for institutional audit that includes the community we interact with to bring innovative approach for promoting gender equity in all areas including science." Prof @agnesbinagwaho  #UGHE’s Vice Chancellor #AskProfAgnes #iwd2022 https://t.co/XfuZo69Scy

“More than 65% of our medical school students are females. We have national numbers showing the gaps with higher representation of males in the field of medicine, as physicians we want to close that gap.”   @TsionYohannes #UGHE's Chair of Center for Gender Equity #AskProfAgnes https://t.co/lvrpn5lrf8

“There is a need to address the education, economic, social and health needs amongst adolescent girls and women in terms of physical, mental and sexual reproductive health” Prof. @MamaDaktari @AKUGlobal @ugent #AskProfAgnes #WomenInScience #IWD2022
